title: [RESOLVED] 10/23 Unable to submit Player Support Tickets
body:
>Update 4:50PM PDT
>
>Forms should be fixed now!  Looks like a file got corrupted somewhere and broke things :(

----

Hey all,

We've been able to verify players are currently unable to submit tickets to Player Support due to forms on the support site not loading properly.  The team is currently investigating, though we're in the early stages.  We'll keep this thread updated with progress on this issue.
